modName: Acdale EyeCandy Body ADEC now TBBP Compatible
summary: A new body for Skyrim based off of Oblivion's HGEC....TBBP Compatible.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ff0000][size=4]New body for Skyrim Special Edition can be found here :[/size][/color][/center]
[center][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/4586/]AcDale's Eyecandy Body ADEC Special Edition[/url][/size][/center]




[center][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7063/6822351636_b5d7f93c40.jpg[/img]
[b][color=#ffc000][size=5]Acdale's EyeCandy Body (ADEC)[/size][/color][/b]
Latest: 3.0[/center]




[b][color=#ff0000][size=3]Description:[/size][/color][/b]
This project started as my attempt to convert Raiar's HGEC to work in Skyrim but ended up being a bit different .I took an old version of his mesh I used in Oblivion
and morphed it into this personalized version.

His original body has been heavily modified to fit my idea of what a perfect female body looks like so this is not exactly a HGEC conversion but more
like a reinvented body using HGEC as a resource. Thanks to Raiar , ADEC body is born. So if you are looking for a copy paste of HGEC into skyrim , this is not it.
The new body consists of larger legs , hips , thinner waistline, enhanced butt and quite alot of arm/shoulder work.

Included in this download is a smaller hand mesh , they just scale better with this body than the vanilla hands..


[b][color=#ffc000][size=5]Click the video tab to view the body in action[/size][/color][/b]


[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7199/7021179229_0c2f05eb76.jpg[/img]

[b][color=#ff0000][size=3]No Physics Version Installation:[/size][/color][/b]
Simply Use NMM and select to overwrite if prompted to do so
Or manually install by:
Copying the meshes and texture folders and place them into your Skyrim/data folder and select to overwrite all.



[b][color=#ff0000][size=3]Important Note if installing physics version:[/size][/color][/b]
There are no animation files included in the downloads . Animations that support BBP and TBBP can be downloaded from other locations , see installation instructions below.

[b][color=#ff0000][size=3]Installation order for installing ADEC with BBP animations would be[/size][/color][/b]
1. Cherry Hotalings [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888]CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod[/url]
2. ADEC TBBP main body file (nude or nevernude) select to overwrite files from Cherry's mod.
3. Install the file named : ""TBBP Deactivator"" from the optional downloads section
4. Download [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11811]FNIS Behavior Files V3.5 or later Always Necessary[/url] Then run GenerateFNISfor Users... Check the box for "SKELETON arm fix"...This fixes the arm casting animation.

[b][color=#ff0000][size=3]Installation order for installing ADEC with TBBP animations would be[/size][/color][/b]
1. Download and install TBBP main file v 1 01 by Dragonfly [color=#ffff00]Alternate link ---->[/color][url=http://www.ulozto.net/x87Y5y2/tbbp-main-file-v-1-01-by-dragonfly-rar]TBBP main file v 1 01 by Dragonfly[/url]
2. [color=#ffff00]Optional Step[/color] Install the TBBP stand still idle animation which can be downloaded from the optional files section on this page... This will replace the twirling idle that comes with Dragonfly's default animations.
3. Install ADEC TBBP main body file (nude or nevernude) and select to overwrite all files from Dragonfly's.
4. Download [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11811]FNIS Behavior Files V3.5 or later Always Necessary[/url] Then run GenerateFNISfor Users... Check the box for "SKELETON arm fix"...This fixes the arm casting animation.

[i][color=#ffff00]NOTE:[/color][/i] [i][color=#ffff00]The ADEC body comes with the skeleton files required for tbbp to work....If you choose to install a custom skeleton , be sure to use one that supports tbbp bones or your game will crash.[/color][/i]



[color=#ff0000][size=3]Optional Files:[/size][/color]
Hairy Pubic Area Texture
Neatly Trimmed Pubic Area Texture
TBBP Deactivator
The Ashen HD ADEC TBBP Compatibility Patch V 2_4



[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7194/6875312836_11a5aa70bc.jpg[/img]
[b][color=#ffc000][size=3]Version Beta:[/size][/color][/b]
Original test release

[b][color=#ffc000][size=3]Version Beta 2:[/size][/color][/b]
Lowered armpits to look more natural and removed some superfluous verticies around the armpits.

Made mesh compatible with vanilla hands , for more compatibility.. Note: do not use Beta 1 hands as they are no longer compatible with the new mesh.

Weight slider has been deactivated untill smaller body is ready.. Note : do not use smaller body from beta 1 as the vertex count is different and not compatible with this new one.

[b][color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 1.0:[/size][/color][/b]
1.Tweaked the larger body a bit around shoulder/armpit area.
2.Fixed the arms so they are less tube shaped and have more muscle curve.
3.Added smaller body (working weight slider ! ) Weight slider mostly effects the breast size and slightly effects butt/arms/leg size..

[b][color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 1.1:[/size][/color][/b]
Updated object space map which almost completely eliminates the seam lines on the arms , shoulders and inner legs.

[b][color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 1.11:[/size][/color][/b]
Updated Uvmap to match better match with the vanilla one... This will reduce or eliminate all the previous skin problems from non converted armors that show skin..
This body is compatible with vanilla or cbbe skin textures , but looks best with the textures included.. see note below about textures.

Note:
Although you may use any other skin texture DO NOT use any other object space map texture ( femalebody_1.msn ) the one included in this download was specifically created to look best with this body..

[b][color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 1.12:[/size][/color][/b]
updated skin textures that further reduce seam line on butt , thanks to Navestea universal 1.6
skin textures ...All armors released for version 1.11 are compatible with this version..

[b][color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 1.13:[/size][/color][/b]
Fixed a seam line at the ankle only visible when zoomed out.

[b][color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 1.14:[/size][/color][/b]
Fixed little overlap between two vertices under the armpit on the smaller weight body.

[b][color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 1.15:[/size][/color][/b]
partially generated new head map (femalehead.msn) to help reduce neck seam line...
you must copy the femalehead.msn into your data/textures/actors/character/female
folder to see the effect
Included a new headskin texture to further reduce appearence of neck seam
thanks to BellaGail for allowing me to the small edits at the neck and include them
in the download.

[b][color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 1.16:[/size][/color][/b]
Reduced visible tan lines
Small fix to the breast area on the large breast physics mesh
Fixed a few verticies that got moved out of place in the groin area during the conversion from old to new uvmap.

[b][color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 1.17:[/size][/color][/b]
Changed file structure a bit to add another body option
Body option 1 (Original)
Is the original base body where the weight slider effects the breast butt and legs

Body option 2 (New)
Smaller breasts and slightly smaller shoulders for minimum weight
Moving the weight slider now only effects the breasts .This option allows you to keep the larger legs and butt while being able to adjust breast size...Also breasts size range is greater in this version
Additional changes to original and new body version....smoothed out some rough areas around the breasts and legs on the max weight body

Optional skin textures added to optional files section

[b][color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 1.18:[/size][/color][/b]
Texture Changes:
Small edits to the object space map (femalebody_1_msn.dds texture) to reduce some
of the distortion under the breasts that was mostly noticable at the smaller weight
Mesh Changes:
Body option 2
large scale body has going through a small edit that widens the midrift and hips slightly to give the body , in my opinion , better overall proportions...Slight change to the shape of the butt consisting of a small lift and tuck under the butt and smoothed out verticies where the hamstring and butt meet on both max and min weight ... After these small changes this body option at max scale , in my opinion is the best looking one to date...

Body Option 3 (new)
This option aims for maximum variation with the weight slider..Max weight has wider midrift , hips , legs , and a rounder butt than the other options..Min weight has the small breasts of option 2 but thinner legs , hips , thighs , calves and a smaller butt.

[b][color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 1.19:[/size][/color][/b]
I am no longer trying to put out countless body variants to satify the masses

Getting back to what I mean't to do from the beginning ,making the shapped body I love and sharing it with everyone that wants to use it...
therefore this version is just that...1 redisigned body which will be the new base body that all of my future armor conversions use.

If you agree 36,24,36 is a nice shape for a woman , then you are in luck as you should be able to find a shape that suits you with the slider. If you like shapless legs and flat backsides you will have to look somewhere else as you will not find it here.

Totally reshapped butt ..It flows into the **wide hips** better and has a more feminine look to it ( in my opinion) See screenshots ...

Being a new base body it is approriate for the weight slider to effect the entire body , so it does.

New femalebody_1_msn.dds texture that adds little more shadow under the buttcheecks.

Thinned the hands and fingers a bit to better fit the arms

4 seperate options in download section:

Nude Body Normal (does not have breast physics)
NeverNude Body Normal (does not have breast physics)
Nude Body With Breast Physics
NeverNude With Breast Physics

[b][color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 1.19 A:[/size][/color][/b]
New femalebody_1.msn that adds cleaner definition to the body and fixes some seaming issues.
Small edits to the _sk texture..

[b][color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 1.20:[/size][/color][/b]
Another fix to the bump map texture to correct some discoloration on and above the shoulder blades , which was only visible if your character had short hair.

Fixes to the default texture to further reduce seam lines in the private area , butt and inner thighs

New specular texture

To further simplify installing the optional textures were removed from the NMM install files and can be downloaded from the optional file section. The optional textures are still included in the manual install file

[b][color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 1.20 A:[/size][/color][/b]
Added the leather undies as an option for never nude. Note: this is being released as a patch file therefore you must have one of the main files installed before using this.

[b][color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 1.20 B:[/size][/color][/b]
To help reduce installation problems and compatibility issues the skeleton used in creating this body has been added to all 4 of the main download files.

My hope is that now all of the armors in the ADEC Armor N Clothing Compilation should work with both the physics and none physics versions, without any crashing.
The animation files required to see the breasts move, for the breast physics versions, have not been included. You will still have to download them from Cherry. See installation instructions at top of page.
Added 3D pubic hair patch to the Patch section. There are 2 files to choose from , the patch for no physics users and the patch for breast physics users. Check screenshots for a preview


[b][color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 1.21 :[/size][/color][/b]
Added the 1st person skeleton that supports breast bones to the breast physics body for better compatibility.
Reskinned around the breasts for a smoother bounce on the nude breast physics version.
Altered textures to eliminate the neck seam..
The leather texture is now default for the nevernude body and the flowered texture is now the optional replacement.


[b][color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 1.21 A :[/size][/color][/b]
Removed the defualtfemale.hkx and defaultmale.hkx as they were causing problems with animations.
This version is only required if version if 1.21 is not working for you. Also , be sure to do a clean install of this version.

[b][color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 2.0 :[/size][/color][/b]
Tweaked the textures a bit to reduce the visible seams . Redid the armpit area of the body texture and optional textures.
Reshaped the armpit area of the body mesh for a more natural look.
Tweaked the uvmap in the armpit area to reduce the appearance of stretching the texture.
Reskinned the body around the armpits , pelvis , butt and upper thighs. The body now has a much smoother deformation most noticeable with the sneak animation.

[b][color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 2.01 :[/size][/color][/b]
Another small edit to the body and hand textures to reduce the wrist seam....

[b][color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 2.1 :[/size][/color][/b]
Reskinned the breasts to be compatible with TBBP bones and animations.
This new body is backwards compatible as well.. This means you can upgrade even if you want to continue using your normal BBP animations.
This is strictly a compatibility update. If you use the non-physics body there is no need to download this update.
See installation instructions at the top of this page.
Armor that supports TBBP can be downloaded here : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24390]
ADEC Tera Armor Collection TBBP by Acdale[/url]

[color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 2.2 :[/size][/color]
The breasts on dead npcs should no longer appear to be crushed or flattened

[color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 2.3 :[/size][/color]
Unfortunately I have not found a true fix for the crushed breasts problem for tbbp...Hopefully in the near future this will change..As of right now 1/2 of the races still suffer from the crushed breasts problem
At first I thought I found a fix with 2.2 but changing the hkx file to fix the crushed breasts basically deactivated the tbbp bones which is why the 2.2 body doesn't move as fluently as the 2.1 one did..
I decided to reupload the true TBBP body as 2.3 and am leaving it up to you guys weather or not to use it as is with* true tbbp fluent and sexy bounce *just like in the video below* but 1/2 of the races will suffer from the crushed breasts bug when killed.... ...Or apply the crushed breasts patch which will basically make this normal bbp again and eliminate the crushed breast problem.

[color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 2.4 TBBP Body :[/size][/color]
Updated skeleton to eliminate the crushed breasts problem in a way that will also allow tbbp to function properly...**See installation instruction for TBBP at the top of this page**

Updated the The Ashen HD ADEC TBBP Compatibility Patch with the new skeleton ( available in the optional downloads section )

Updated the skin ( _sk) textures for the body , hand and head so there will be no more bronze skin in the shadows...see more info here : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29791]No More Ugly Bronze Skin by COTS[/url] Thanks to yllib for his idea and free to use as a modders resource I included it in the main TBBP download.

[color=#ffc000]Skeleton edits in this version:[/color]
The default skeleton in this package = TBBP with RR Realistic Force and all proportions = to perfect 3_2 except for the thighs.

[color=#ff0000][size=3]*Note*[/size][/color]
Since this fix required a direct skeleton edit , problems could arise if you plan to replace the default adec skeleton with a custom one.. Since the edits to the skeleton were based off of one of Skulltyrant's I am sure most if not all of his TBBP skeletons would work fine but would change the way the breasts behave slightly due to the settings on the BsLagBoneController node......I have not been able to get xp32's maximum compatible skeleton to work without crushing the breasts...

[color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 2.4 No Physics Body :[/size][/color]
Updated the skin ( _sk) textures for the body , hand and head so there will be no more bronze skin in the shadows.

[color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 2.4.1 No Physics Body :[/size][/color]
Fixed the no physics version so it can be used with bbp and tbbp armor without crashing the game.

[color=#ffc000][size=3]Version 3.0 :[/size][/color]
Added more vertices to help smooth out some rough areas around the butt and breasts.
Did some mild tweaking to the breasts to give them a more realistic shape.
Updated the skeleton files . TBBP should now work on npcs and the crushed breast problem on dead npcs should be gone.





What is TBBP ? ( Tender Breast Physics ) See video below:
[url=http://www.dailymotion.com/video/xwe6bb_adec-2-2-tender-bbp-for-skyrim_videogames#.UOQJQHexlBk][img]http://i.imgur.com/QJhSN.png[/img]
[/url]
[youtube]DYfRKSjd4sg[/youtube]



[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7245/6875312926_d2eed27f2f.jpg[/img]
Do not change the shape of the body meshes.
Do not upload this body to steam workshop or any other site.
No permission needed to use this body in converting armors made to fit it. I just ask to be notified if you use it , credit me , and post a link to the body mod.



[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7270/7021179317_c643b5c072.jpg[/img]
Thanks to xs2reality for cleaning up the bump map , new spec texture and help with the default skin texture
Thanks to BellaGail for permission to use her textures to reduce neck seam
Thanks to Navetsea for the included skin texture .
Thanks to Exnem , RAIAR and Madcat221 for the original HGEC body.
Thanks to Phygit for the foot mesh.
Thanks to ReddMan for writting the xml file for the NMM installer
Thanks to Monsto for help with the optional skin textures
Thanks to Monsto for the video
Thanks to KrisTi for the open license on her 3d pubic mesh
Thanks to Radioragae for the neck seam resource.
Thanks to xp32 for his maximum compatible skeletons
